      • parm

        public ParmMarker parm(int jdbcType,
                       java.lang.Object value)
        Create a SQL parameter marker expression for the SQL statement. A "?" will be generated in the SQL statement for each parameter marker.
        Specified by:
        parm in interface ISQLTypeFactory
        Parameters:
        jdbcType - the JDBC type for the parameter marker
        value - the data value for the parameter marker.
        Returns:
        a ParmMarker expression

        Types
